label: water
caption: The brown dog stands at the edge of the calm ocean, its fur ruffled by the gentle breeze as it gazes out at the rolling waves in front of it. The sun shines brightly overhead, casting a warm glow over the scene and sending a few stray strands of seaweed drifting across the surface of the water. In the distance, the sandy beach stretches out to meet the receding tide, where a handful of seagulls wheel lazily overhead, adding to the peaceful atmosphere.
